tooltip: Select General Onox as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: General Onox focuses on improving Labrynna's Creature units.
Allows you to summon General Onox, a giant lumbering hero that attacks with a massive flail.
Large Creature unit that burns enemies with Fire damage.
HP for all Creature units is increased by 5% (Village) 10% (Town) and 15% (City)
Reduces the Training Time of all Creature units.
